alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 8:50AM CDT until May 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River near Sweeny affecting Brazoria County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River Near East Bernard affecting Austin, Fort Bend, Colorado and Wharton Counties. San Bernard River near Boling affecting Fort Bend, Brazoria and Wharton Counties. For the San Bernard River...including East Bernard, Sweeny, Boling... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Bernard River Near East Bernard. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage with minor roads along the river inundated. Backwater flooding up Britt Branch and Bratcher Slough begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Thursday was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 13.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.4 feet on 05/20/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun San Bernard River East Bernard 17.0 17.3 Thu 8 am CDT 16.7 15.9 15.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM CDT.
